prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Samuel T. Calfee Document, Mss. Collection 2001.34, Kegley Library, Wytheville Community College, Wytheville, VA

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Donated by Ruth Ann Chitwood in 2001 as part of the W. R. Chitwood Collection.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a one page letter from Samuel T. Calfee to Major Andrew Kincannon dated 7 December 1842 requesting payment for wheat ($18.75) by way of Halbert Allison.
